author: Lesley
title: Birthday Weekend
text: Fabulous experience at St Regis AGAIN! This is my favorite resort on Miami Beach - excellent service, style and beach location. Can't wait to return...!!

author: Gitithacham
title: Best location
text: Didn’t got to enjoy the place I came for a short time

author: Marie
title: Hotel que cumple lo que promete.
text: Excelente servicio de todo el personal en todas las áreas, el servicio de limpieza nunca nos molestó y siempre hicieron el servicio sin que nos diéramos cuenta en el momento en que no nos encontrábamos en la habitación. Todo fue muy bueno incluyendo el servio del valet parking.

author: Anonymous
title: 12 Year Anniversary
text: Our stay at the St. Regis Miami was more than we could have ever hoped for. From booking our reservations to the service we experienced there was nothing lacking. We will definitely be making the St. Regis our hotel of choice when traveling in the future.

author: Ratcliff
title: Top level stay
text: From the lobby to the rooms to the service...it’s all incredible. Get there as soon as you can!

responses.author: October 4, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Ratliff,
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the generous review. Perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort offers a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved your stay, and we look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: MikeE
title: I wish I lived there!
text: First class from arrival through departure.

responses.author: October 6, 2019
responses.text:
Dear MikeE,
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the generous review. Perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort offers a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved your stay, and we look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Anisah
title: Great Stay-cation!
text: My husband and I decided we needed a small stay-cation and chose the St. Regis in Bal Harbour. From the moment we stepped into the hotel, we were transported to another world. The ambiance and service was above and beyond and the oceanfront view was breathtaking. There was so much attention to detail, including the pillow spray with turndown service, the digital blinds and the best part for me- the soaking tub.

responses.author: October 3, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Anisah:
Thank you for being our guest and for the generous rating of The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. Awarded the Forbes five-star and AAA five-diamond award, our hotel is located across from the celebrated Bal Harbour Shops, and not far from the dynamic energy of South Beach. We appreciate hearing how much you enjoyed getting away with us and we hope you will come back to see us soon.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: DJ
title: Staff do not care
text: No one cares about your experience. They rely on the nice rooms to get by.

responses.author: October 3, 2019
responses.text:
Dear DJ:
We are committed to providing extraordinary service to our guests, wish you to know that your feedback is essential to our team. We wish to extend our apologies and would welcome another opportunity to show you with the hospitality for which we are known.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Jj
title: St. Regis is exceptional in every category.
text: St. Regis is exceptional in every category!

responses.author: September 29, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Jj,
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the generous review. Perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort offers a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved your stay, and we look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Paul
title: Sales trip
text:
Nice hotel with friendly staff. Enjoyed our time,
But fitness center is sub-standard for this quality of hotel

responses.author: September 26, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Paul:
Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your visit. We are pleased your overall stay was enjoyable, and appreciate you kind words for staff. But we want it to be flawless and are passionate about exceeding the expectations of our guests, so thank you for your suggestions. Thank you for choosing our hotel, and we hope you will give us another opportunity to welcome you to the perfect stay you deserve.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Manuel
title: FANTASTICO HOTEL
text: Hotel perfecto para descansar, muy silencioso y excelente ubicación, linda vista y los cuartos de excelente tamano

author: Windswept1
title: Luxury beyond compare.
text: The moment one enter this St Regis, you are surrounded by beauty and charm. Met by a warm skilled staff, one can relax into the rest of the day. Hard to believe how consistently wonderful the staff are at this property. One just has to experience this first hand. Looking for a rewarding experience trimmed with art in simple elegant surroundings, and served by amazing people, this St Regis is the place for pleasure or business travel.

responses.author: September 23, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Windswept1:
Thank you for being our recent guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments for both our property and staff, and we are pleased that we could provide you with a seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with all of our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to the area.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Anonymous
title: Buena
text: En general todo muy bien excepto la calidad del Buffet y del Brunch.- La fruta verde y el resto de la oferta me hizo desestimar continuar consumiendo el desayuno Buffet y el Brunch la relación precio calidad no es la adecuada.- El costo del Vino Blanco es desmesurado en el Buffet.- Contrasta con los platos del desayuno a la carta que son superiores

author: TheBigBoss
title: Go Big or Go Home
text: St. Regis Bal Harbour was the perfect Resort for our 20 year anniversary.

responses.author: September 22, 2019
responses.text:
Dear TheBigBoss,
Thank you for choosing The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort for your anniversary celebration. Our location provides an escape like no other; with the Atlantic Ocean at our doorstep, the legendary Bal Harbour Shops across Collins Avenue, and much more only moments away. We appreciate you sharing how much you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your next visit.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Tiya
title: Wonderful Stay
text: The hotel has great view and excellent service. It’s right across the street from Bal Harbour shopping center. Great location!

responses.author: September 21, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Tiya,
Thank you for choosing The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort during your visit to Miami. Our location provides an escape like no other; with the Atlantic Ocean at our doorstep, the legendary Bal Harbour Shops across Collins Avenue, and much more only moments away. We appreciate you sharing how much you enjoyed our great view, location, and excellent service. We look forward to your next visit.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Maca
title: Wonderful Weekend Getaway
text: The hotel is conveniently located close to shopping and dinning. The staff is friendly and professional, they try to accommodate all your needs. I would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Miami who is interested in a upscale experience.

responses.author: September 11, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Maca,
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the generous review. Perfect for upscale getaways or family vacations, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort offers a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved our convenient location, professional staff, and overall experience. It was a pleasure to be a part of your stay, and we look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

responses.author: September 10, 2019
responses.text:
Dear AF: Thank you for visiting us for your anniversary celebration and for taking the time to share your review. We are disappointed that Hurricane Dorian disrupted our available services and that we missed significant opportunities to show you our commitment to service excellence. We want to thank you for your patience and hope to have another opportunity on your next visit to the area to provide you with the superb hospitality for which we are known.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: GregWoods
title: Vacation Greg Woods
text: Great!Will definitely stay again.

responses.author: September 4, 2019
responses.text:
Dear GregWoods,
Thank you for the generous rating of The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. Awarded the Forbes five-star and AAA five-diamond awards for 2017, our hotel is located across from the celebrated Bal Harbour Shops, and not far from the dynamic energy of South Beach. We appreciate hearing how much you enjoyed a perfectly relaxing vacation with us and look forward to seeing you soon for another memorable experience.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Dvdstreet
title: No Manager on Duty
text: We left on the weekend of Dorian, room service wasn’t open as advertised (their changed, updated hours were changed without notifying guests), and there was no manager on duty upon our checkout Sunday morning. Miami was out of the “cone” beginning at least Saturday. I understand everyone needs to be safe, but if the hotel is going to be open, someone should be in charge.

responses.author: September 5, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Dvdstreet,
Thank you for choosing us and taking the time to leave a review. We apologize for the issues and inconveniences you experienced during your stay with us. We aim to give each guest the absolute best service possible, and we hate that we fell short. This is not the level of service we usually provide, so we regret you left with an unfavorable opinion of our hotel. We have shared your concerns with our staff to ensure we are providing the best visit we possibly can to our guests. Please contact us directly to discuss further details and concerns regarding your stay with us. We appreciate your business and wish you all the best in your future travels.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: SherylPaparella
title: Excellent Service
text: St. Regis Bal Harbor is an excellent location and a beautiful property. I would highly recommend. You will be treated like Royalty. The staff is helpful, friendly and very professional.

responses.author: September 2, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments, and we are pleased that we could provide you with such a relaxing and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to Miami.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: RobE
title: Great Hotel with impeccable service.
text: Awesome staff that will appease your every need and concern. Beach access is great with chairs and umbrellas included. Every room is oceanfront with huge balconies and daybeds. Wife and I would definitely return.

responses.author: September 1, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments, and we are pleased that we could appease your every need and concern. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we are glad to hear we can be your home again when your travels bring you back to Miami.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

responses.author: September 1, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments, and we are pleased that we could appease your every need and concern. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we are glad to hear we can be your home again when your travels bring you back to Miami.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Fritz
title: Aniversario de bodas
text: Excelente Hotel , servicio amable, muy buenas habitaciones con na vista al mar. La oferta gastronómica es bastante sencilla, quizás destaca el sushi bar. La verdad que un Hotel con estas características merece tener un restaurant de mayor nivel al ofrecido

responses.author: August 30, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Fritz,
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the generous review. Perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort offers a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved your stay, and we look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Blah
title: Nice hotel but you may hear noise from next door
text: It’s a great location but we had some issues during our brief stay, our main complaint was we kept hearing our neighbors above us. The rooms have massive sliding doors and they are audible if you happen to be below a unit that is occupied. Our upstairs neighbors were opening the balcony door throughout the night, suffice to say we did not get much sleep.

responses.author: August 30, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Blah,
We apologize for the disturbances from other guests during the night. We are sorry you did not sleep well in our hotel and that if you did notify us, we failed to resolve the problem while you are here. We appreciate your feedback and hope you will stay with us again in the future.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: LizFerreri
title: Visiting Miami
text: Beatiful hotel. Orchids and flowers everywhere.

responses.author: August 26, 2019
responses.text:
Dear LizFerreri:
Thank you for visiting with us and for the generous rating of The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. Awarded the Forbes five-star and AAA five-diamond awards, our hotel is located across from the celebrated Bal Harbour Shops, and not far from the dynamic energy of South Beach. We appreciate hearing how much you enjoyed our property and lovely grounds and we hope you will come back to see us soon.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: MazieMAlpert
title: Experience
text:
Overall, St. Regis is AMAZING!
Staff is so nice, friendly, accommodating!

responses.author: August 24, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments, and we are pleased that we could provide you with a seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to Miami.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: VinodRathore
title: Stay at St. Regis
text: Excellent rooms and staff that went the extra mile to make our stay memorable.

responses.author: August 25, 2019
responses.text:
Dear VinodRathore,
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments, and we are pleased that we could provide you with a seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to Miami.
Sincerely,

responses.author: August 25, 2019
responses.text:
Dear VinodRathore,
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments, and we are pleased that we could provide you with a seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to Miami.

author: A7starhotel
title: Outstanding hotel
text: Staff are so courteous, welcoming and helpful. Rooms are spacious and neatly designed, balcony view is amazing, beach and spa service is so great.

author: Anonymous
title: there is nothing wrong to say.
text: I would have liked on my arrival in that heat a wet cloth to freshen up, definitely not champagne in the middle of the day, a nice glass of chilly fruit juice, I would also have liked to have a coffee machine in my room so that when I wake up in the morning to be able to have a cup of coffee, also when I wake up after my noon rest.

author: Duaine
title: My 20th Anniversary
text: My wife and I celebrated our 20th Anniversary at the St. Regis Bal Harbor. The experience was as a perfect starting gate for our next. 20.

responses.author: August 21, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Duaine:
First of all, congratulations on your wedding anniversary and thank you for spending it with us. We are perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, and offer a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved your stay, and we look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: ChrisHulse
title: Mr. Hulse
text: Great place to stay with plenty of amenities.

responses.author: August 20, 2019
responses.text:
Dear ChrisHulse:
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the kind words and generous review. Perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort offers a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved all that we have to offer, and we look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: NA
title: Wonderful place
text: I loved everything! Beautiful hotel,nice staff great service

responses.author: August 22, 2019
responses.text:
Dear NA:
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort and for your comments. We are pleased that we could provide you with a seamless and meaningful stay and will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team. We hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to the Miami area.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: MariaCGF
title: St. Regis Bal Harbour deixa a desejar
text: Não espere qualidade no atendimento do St Regis Bal Harbour. É apenas um hotel bonito.

responses.author: August 15, 2019
responses.text:
Dear MariaCGF:
Thank you for visiting and for letting us know about your experience. We are committed to providing extraordinary service to our guests, and we regret if these standards got overlooked while you were with us. Your feedback is essential to our team, and we want to extend our apologies. We would welcome another opportunity to show you with the hospitality for which we are known.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Eric
title: My Favorite Hotel :)
text: I continue to return to the St. Regis, over and over again because of the way we are treated there. It is just wonderful!

responses.author: August 10, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Eric,
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments, and we are pleased that we could provide you with a seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we hope to continue to be your home every time your travels bring you to Miami.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: MuhammadK
title: St. Regis Bal Harbour
text: Loved the stay, really appreciated the personalized service.

responses.author: August 9, 2019
responses.text:
Dear MuhammadK,
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the generous review. Perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort offers a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved your stay, and we look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: JeremyA
title: Beautiful Rooms: Missing Something
text: The hotel is beautiful. It is missing something with service though. Not even sure what it is but I felt very much like the lone man out or just significantly less important than others there. As a young guy, this really turned me off from the property. I highly enjoy luxury travel and do it a lot, especially travel for work, and just came back, yes with a tan, but just saying, "it was okay".

responses.author: August 2, 2019
responses.text:
Dear JeremyA,
Thank you for choosing us for your recent Miami visit. We are genuinely sorry for the experience you had with our staff. We strive to provide authentic and caring service from each member of our team, and we are grateful for feedback that helps us improve our services. We have shared your concerns with the appropriate individuals to ensure this is not repeated. We appreciate your patience and hope you will consider staying with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Mateus
title: Estada St Regis
text: Ótima localização , conforto e atendimento excelente , ficou a desejar no apartamento relacionado ao colchão e um alto barulho da geladeira

responses.author: August 3, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Mateus,
Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are pleased your overall stay was enjoyable, and we appreciate feedback that helps us improve our guest experience. We apologize for the inconvenience with the noise from the fridge. We will address this with the appropriate individuals and take suitable action. We hope you will consider a return visit so we can show you we are devoted to giving each guest an exceptional stay.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: LJG
title: Jlo concert and 50th Anniversary stay
text: Was surprised with Gold Elite no early check in was available

responses.author: July 31, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Shelly:
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort and for your review. We are grateful for your generous comments, and we are pleased that we could provide you with a seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing all your compliments with our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to South Florida.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Caroline
title: Café da manha
text: O café da manhã é caro parabuma familia com 4 pessoas, onde crianças de 7 anos pagam integralmente. Não tem uma opção mais razoavel. Cobrar 49 dólares para um café da manhã é muito alto.

responses.author: July 24, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Caroline: Thank you for visiting and for your review. We appreciate feedback that helps us improve our guest experience, and appreciate you comments regarding our breakfast offerings. I hope you will consider a return visit so we can show you we are devoted to giving each guest an exceptional stay.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: CLNG
title: St. Regis BalHarbour
text: Hotel é excelente, tudo é perfeito e indicado para família.

responses.author: July 17, 2019
responses.text:
Dear CLNG: It was a pleasure to welcome you to The St. Regis Washington, D.C. Thank you for mentioning how much you enjoyed that our property was suitable for family enjoyment. We are passionate about creating a welcoming and authentic atmosphere, and we appreciate the acknowledgment of our devotion. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we hope to see you soon.
Sincerely,
Mr. Felix Schaller
Director of Operations

author: SHARONMUALEM
title: Not right for quiet time
text: Ongoing construction prevented rest and relaxation at this resort.

responses.author: July 16, 2019
responses.text:
Hello. Thank you for being our guest and for your comments. We are very sorry your stay was interrupted by ongoing maintenance and construction issues. We apologize for the inconvenience, appreciate your patience, and look forward to another opportunity to provide you with the perfect stay.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Anonymous
title: A wonderful stay. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
text: Excellent service. !!!!!!!!!!!!!

responses.author: July 18, 2019
responses.text:
Hello. Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort and for your comments. We are pleased that the service provided by our staff could help you with a seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to the area.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Sammy
title: Baby moom
text: Amazing beautiful ambiance greatest staff

responses.author: July 14, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Sammy,
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments, and we are pleased that we could provide you with a seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to Miami.

responses.author: July 12, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Sammy,
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments, and we are pleased that we could provide you with a seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to Miami.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: NancyH
title: Top-notch service with luxurious setting
text: We had a short stay st the StR in BH, but wow what an experience. Our jr suite had a huge balcony with 2 loungers. We spent most afternoons there napping after spending the day at the pool and the beach. The butler service was very helpful in getting a couple of issues in the room resolved. The hotel itself is beautiful enough to be a museum. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay there again.

responses.author: July 11, 2019
responses.text:
Dear NancyH: It was our pleasure welcoming you to The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are delighted that your experience was perfect from beginning to end. We enjoy knowing that our guests can relax and feel at home in their gorgeously appointed rooms and awaken each morning to the gentle breeze of the Atlantic. On behalf of all of us, we thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, and we hope to see you again soon.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: EddyBalma
title: Best of the Best
text: This property was special for us. Had a suite with two balcony decks over the beach. Service , food and staff were all 5 stars. I will return and highly recommend .

responses.author: July 9, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Ebalma: Thank you for choosing The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort and for your review. It is inspiring to know that we exceeded your expectations and that you particularly enjoyed our fantastic views of the Atlantic Ocean. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: ExceededExpectation
title: Finest hotel staff I have ever experienced
text: The staff was attentive to every need, but not in your face. The professionalism extended across-the-board. The Butler‘s, the cleaning people, the management, and anyone else I encountered was polite and helpful.

responses.author: July 13, 2019
responses.text:
Dear ExceededExpectation,
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments, and we are pleased that we could provide you with a seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to Miami.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: scg
title: improvement
text: While at the hotel everything and every expectation was exceeded, however when calling with questions (before and after stay) people where not friendly. For example when requesting an itemized statement from Shelby at the fiance department, she was not kind at all. Overall experience at the hotel we impeccable but the "over the phone" etiquette has room for improvement .

responses.author: July 5, 2019
responses.text:
Dear scg,
Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your visit. We are pleased your overall stay was enjoyable, but we want it to be flawless. We are passionate about exceeding the expectations of our guests, and we genuinely apologize for not doing so during your time with us. Thank you for choosing our hotel, and we hope you will give us another opportunity to welcome you to the perfect stay you deserve.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: JoshK
title: Great Service.
text: We had an amazing stay at the St Regis. Everything exceeded our expectations.

responses.author: July 2, 2019
responses.text:
Dear JoshK; On behalf of our associates, thank you for visiting with us and for the generous review. Perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, we offer a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved your stay, and we look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Anonymous
title: Mrs
text: Very good Resort for a family

responses.author: July 7, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Guest,
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the generous review. Perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort offers a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved your stay, and we look forward to having you and your family visit with us again.
Sincerely,

author: Meg
title: Great Stay!
text: Staying at the St Regis Bal Harbour was amazing. The room, view and beaches were great. HIGHLY RECOMMEND STAYING HERE. They value your platinum status unlike the Ritz which I really appreciated. Overall awesome service at the pool and beach. They could use a few more servers down by the beach. The Atlantikos restaurant had snobby waiters who acted like they were too good to service you but the breakfast food was good. However, I didn't experience this type of service anywhere else at the hotel.

responses.author: June 28, 2019
responses.text:
Dear Meg,
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the generous review. Perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort offers a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved your stay, and we look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Anonymous
title: Sensacional
text: Experiência única do check In até o final!!! Extraordinário atendimento e conforto em todas as áreas do hotel!

responses.author: June 27, 2019
responses.text:
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the generous review. Perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort offers a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know that you experience was unique and extraordinary and that you loved your stay. We look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: MARCE
title: Excelente
text: muy bueno todo, la pase genial. muy calido el servicio

author: Toronto
title: Late Checkout Denied
text: After paying posted rate in low season and letting hotel know our flight was late they denied a late checkout multiple times.

responses.author: June 27, 2019
responses.text:
Thank you for your comments, as we appreciate feedback that helps us improve our guest experience. We apologize for the inconvenience of your check out while you were our guest. We will address this with the appropriate individuals and hope you will consider a return visit so we can show you we are devoted to giving each guest an exceptional stay.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Anonymous
title: An Amazing Hotel
text: The Bal Harbour St Regis is perfect in every way, from the staff that caters to your every need to the gorgeous rooms. You will never be disappointed staying there.

responses.author: June 26, 2019
responses.text:
Thank you for being our guest at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your kind comments, and we are pleased that we could provide you with a perfectly seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to our area.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: 2019gc
title: Bal harbour st regis
text: Not as good as what we expected. Dinning in the alantokos below average.

author: MARIA17
title: SOBRESALIENTE
text:
SOBRESALIENTE SERVICIO
EL MEJOR DE TODO MIAMI
A SEGUIR SUPERANDOSE DIA A DIA

author: Anonymous
title: Superb Property Not To Miss
text: From the moment you arrive you feel as if you are royalty. The staff is courteous, attentive and want you to have a superb stay. The rooms are over the top, the bathrooms are large, private and the attention to detail is obvious. The food is top notch and the pool and beach attendants only too happy to assist. We lived this property!!!! Worth every penny!!!!

author: Anonymous
title: Exelente
text:
Desde que empece a parar en este hotel, cada vez que puedo me alojo en los hoteles St. Regis, ya sea en Roma, Florencia y no recuerdo algun otro.
Este fin de ano vanos a pasarlo en Paris y nos alojaremos en el St. Regis de esa ciudad

author: MichellePowell
title: Our Anniversary stay
text: Our experience was excellent. We have been here several times and it is definitely our favorite hotel

responses.author: June 19, 2019
responses.text:
Dear MichellePowell: Thank you for being our guest once again at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. We are grateful for your generous comments, and are pleased that we could provide you with a seamless and meaningful stay. We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and look forward to welcoming you again soon.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

responses.text:

We never want a guest to leave with a contrary opinion, and if given the opportunity, we would have taken measures to address every concern while you were staying with us. We hope you will consider giving us another chance to provide you with the flawless and meaningful stay you deserve.

Guest Recognition Manager

text: The attention to detail is phenomenal, as well as the personal touch of everyone knowing who you are. They are excellent at anticipating your every need.

responses.author: June 13, 2019
responses.text:

We will enjoy sharing your compliments with our team, and we hope to be your home every time your travels bring you to the Miami area.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Jacquelinepsico
title: Experiencia única
text: Fue una estadía perfecta, el personal muy amable y servicial, las instalaciones muy bellas y bien cuidadas y lo mejor la ubicación del hotel

author: GRajaratnam
title: DISAPPOINTED WITH FRONT DESK
text:
Pros: Beautiful hotel and great view of the ocean from our room. Delicious food at Atlantikós.
Cons: We had a displeasing check in process with front desk receptionist, Salma. She did not offer champagne upon arrival, declined late checkout, did not inform butler service to set up a birthday surprise for our arrival.

responses.author: June 14, 2019
responses.text:
Dear GRajaratnam,
Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are disappointed that we missed several significant opportunities to show you our commitment to service excellence. We regret not living up to our hotel's name, and we want to thank you for your patience. We hope to have another opportunity on your next visit to Miami to provide you with the superb hospitality for which we are known.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: ZmanNH
title: Outstanding resort-one of Marriott’s best
text: First time stay at St Regis Bal Harbour, this property ranks in the top three in my 40+ years of traveling. Service is outstanding. Restaurants all five star. Property is beautiful. Pools are great and poolside service best in class.

responses.author: June 5, 2019
responses.text:
Dear ZmanNH:
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the generous review. As you have discovered, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort offers a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved your stay and to be listed among your favorite places. We look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: DisappointedGuest
title: St Regis Bal Harbor
text: Stay away. Old property. Terrible service. Horrible and overpriced food. Don’t go to the lounge at night. At best they hired some karaoke singer worse than my pet dog to sing.

responses.author: June 4, 2019
responses.text:
Hello: Thank you for visiting and for taking the time to evaluate our hotel. We are truly sorry your stay was not the exceptional experience you deserve. Your observations are welcome and appreciated as we are always working to improve and planning for the future. We hope you will consider giving us another chance to provide you with the flawless and meaningful stay you deserve.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: none
title: Stay at the St Regis
text: I travel frequently for business and the St Regis stands out for luxury and service. The rooms are not cheap but are if you want luxury, this is the place to be. The fees for in-room alcohol is excessively expensive and parking is high as well.

responses.author: May 31, 2019
responses.text:
Dear none,
Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are pleased your overall stay was enjoyable, and we appreciate feedback that helps us improve our guest experience. We apologize for the inconvenience with the prices of the beverages in your room and our parking fee. We will address this with the appropriate individuals and take suitable action. We hope you will consider a return visit so we can show you we are devoted to giving each guest an exceptional stay.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: ShawnLyons
title: Amazing Experience
text: I can't say enough how impressed we were with everything, we mostly dealt with Philip in the Cabana, we had the same Cabana for 3 straight days and he took unbelievable care of us. He was amazing, and we will be back to visit him at the Cabana.

responses.author: May 30, 2019
responses.text:
Dear ShawnLyons:
Thank you for visiting and for the warm compliments regarding your stay at The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort. It is lovely to know how much you enjoyed our devoted staff, particularly Philip. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience, and we look forward to your next visit.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: CherylandBill

text: If you want luxury your choice should be the St Regis

Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: ZaidaM
title: Five Star resort close to home
text: Unassuming on the outside, full of ritz and glamour on the inside. Superb service and elegance throughout the resort. There is something for everyone here, child friendly , romantic, great pools and Beach, excellent restaurants and the perfect location in south Florida.

responses.author: May 28, 2019
responses.text:
Dear ZaidaM:
On behalf of our associates, thank you for the generous review. Perfect for celebratory getaways or family vacations, The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort does indeed have everything. We offer a haven of oceanfront elegance, refined luxury, and flawless service. We are pleased to know how much you loved your stay, and we look forward to having you visit with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: TinaB
title: The best service and a gorgeous hotel
text:
This is my 3rd stay at this property and I love it. The pool and the beach are beautiful and the attendants make sure your needs are taken care of and the rooms are amazing. The staff is genuine and so helpful.
Best place to relax and unwind.

author: DMS
title: Luxury at its best
text:
I have 3k nights stayed and 10 million lifetime points.
This property is without a doubt one of the all time best of the best.While it's easy to build a great property it's another to fill it with a great staff. No request is too small or large.The atmosphere is luxurious and relaxing.The rooms are well thought out and designed.We had a huge balcony which doubled as another room!
Huge shoutout to Victoria and Sonie who made our stay special

text: Absolutely stunning resort--located in a relatively quite area with an uncrowded beach, under-utilized pool amongst guests with phenomenal, welcoming and accommodating staff to ensure your stay is incredible.

author: Mr
title: review
text:
Beautiful property, stunning decor, and nice pool area
Beach had a lot of seaweed which is minor and out of the hotel's control
Found the staff rude and not very helpful

responses.author: May 15, 2019
responses.text:
Hello:
Thank you for choosing us for your recent Miami visit and for your comments on our property. We are genuinely sorry however for the experience you had with staff. We strive to provide authentic and caring service from each member of our team, and we are grateful for feedback that helps us improve our services. We will share your concerns with the appropriate individuals to ensure this is not repeated in the future. We appreciate your patience and hope you will consider staying with us again.
Sincerely,
Guest Recognition Manager

author: Anonymous
title: Volveré

author: AWKhan
title: Good Location for Beach goers
text: Excellent location, nice clean and upscale amenities and high end technology fitted rooms. Nice place for quite or family getaway.

author: MichaelOliverio
title: Poor customer service
text: I had a discount rate and at checkin and departure the hotel would not accept it even though I had proper documentation

responses.author: May 2, 2019
responses.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your valuable feedback. It has come to my attention that the rate received during your recent stay did not meet your expectations. Please accept my sincerely apologies if this may have caused any inconvenience.
As per our Explore Rate program guidelines, I would love the opportunity to speak with you more about the incident and in an effort to prevent this issue from occurring in the future. The experience you described is not characteristic of the level of service our associates strive to provide.
Please let me know the best contact number and time to reach you, or feel free to contact me via email anytime. I look forward to speaking with you in order to restore your confidence in the St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort.
Sincerely,
Kashmira Maneckji
Director of Operations
The St. Regis Resort Bal Habour

author: MrD
title: Hotel service
text: Could not find a better resort that offers unbelievable service. I rate it a 10plus
